metadata.dc:author: Baltasar, Aniceto
Domínguez-Adame, Eduardo
metadata.dc:description: When bariatric and metabolic surgery initially began in Spain, it was a subject of debate, due to not knowing exactly who were the first surgeons to perform it. A study has revealed the authors of the first interventions.
metadata.dc:subject: Bariatría española
Spanish bariatrics
Cirugía metabolica
Cirugía bariátrica
Metabolic surgery
Surgical history
Historia cirugía
Bariatric surgery
metadata.dc:title: Inicios de la cirugía bariátrica y metabólica en España.
[Beginnings of bariatric and metabolic surgery in Spain].
